hindi:
कस्तूरी कुंडली बसै, मृग ढूंढे बन माहि।
ऐसे घटी घटी राम हैं दुनिया देखै नाँहि।
english:
Kasturi kundali basai, mrig dhundhe ban mahi.
Aise ghati ghati ram hain duniya dekhi nahi.
translation: Just like the scent the musk deer is searching for in the forest resides in its own glands. Same way, God resides in everyone's hearts yet the world keeps on searching for Him.
